subject: Re: [junit] Automated class testing
msgSnippet: Hi opix_79 , ... I m not quite sure what you re asking. Could you elaborate on what you mean by automated class testing and before we use JUnit ? Lasse PS.
messageBody:
Hi "opix_79",

On 1/9/07, opix_79 <opix_79@...> wrote:
> i want to ask???
> is there tools to generate automated class testing before we use Junit??
> please inform!!
> thanks

I'm not quite sure what you're asking. Could you elaborate on what you
mean by "automated class testing" and "before we use JUnit"?

Lasse

PS. You might want to consider reducing your use of exclamation marks
and concecutive punctuation characters in general. They're generally
considered a sign of "shouting", which isn't a nice way of asking a
question.
